articles.author: Ivana Kottasová
articles.title: Accident or sabotage? American and European officials disagree as key undersea cables are cut - CNN
articles.description: Investigators are trying to crack the mystery of how two undersea internet cables in the Baltic Sea were cut within hours of each other, with European officials saying they believe the disruption was an act of sabotage and US officials suggesting it was likel…
